title: Tech explodes for seven runs late to rally past KU - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Tech explodes for seven runs late to rally past KU - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: LAWRENCE, Kansas – No. 7 Texas Tech exploded for four runs in the seventh, and three more in the ninth for insurance, to defeat Kansas 8-2 on Friday night at Hoglund Ballpark. Tech improves to 3-1 in Big 12 play and 23-5 overall.
